page.title: 16Security _ Mulben Warehouses
page.content: When our mini_bus drove up to the bonded warehouses, we could not get inside until the security men raised the barrier to allow us to pass. Mr Sherrit met us and came on to our mini_bus to accompany us round the whole site. When he took us inside one of the warehouses, he told us that there are two locks on each one and that two different men hold the two different keys. At night, alsatian guard dogs are brought from kennels in Keith to guard the warehouses during the night. In case of fire, there is a hugh reservoir of water nearby. If the temperature inside a warehouse rises, an alarm sounds, and sprinklers are set in action to bring down the temperature. Whisky from 90 distilleries is stored there.
